creator: phearinc@yahoo.com
text:
I would love to completely automate build processes for many of my apps.  One 
unfortunate thing is that i'm forced to use an SSH client to run some server 
side scripts to assist in deployment.

Are there any plans to add an SSH task to Ant?  There's an Open Source API for 
a client called MindTerm that many people use for SSH integration, but it's 
rather cumbersome.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** Bug 13663 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** Bug 16499 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
CVS HEAD now contains two new tasks <scp> and <sshexec>.

Please try a recent nightly build and help with debuging improving the tasks.
You'll need a recent version of jsch, which can be found at
<http://www.jcraft.com/>
